title: Banner University Tucson Integrative Therapy Services | Banner Health
description: Banner Health offers integrative therapy services at Banner University Tucson. To learn more, visit our location today.
cleaned_text: At Banner - University Medical Center Tucson, we use integrative medicine to treat medical conditions such as depression, allergies, cancer, diabetes and heart disease. We also offer preventive care recommendations. Our doctors will partner with you to determine which therapies may work best for you. We also provide preventive counseling. We offer multiple integrative therapies for our patients, including: Our [Arizona Center for Integrative Medicine](http://integrativemedicine.arizona.edu/) leads the world in integrative medicine. The program was founded in 1994 by Andrew Weil, MD, and has grown from a visionary concept to the world leader in integrative medical education. The partnership between Banner Health and the University of Arizona brings clinical care delivery, education and research to the forefront of the patient experience.
